title: Comeback…Or Collapse?
description:
Jalen & Jacoby talk the Celtics epic fourth quarter comeback in Game 1 of the NBA Finals. Jalen reveals what the Celtics did RIGHT down the stretch and what the Warriors did WRONG that led to the result. PLUS – Steph had a HISTORIC first quarter, but was fairly pedestrian after that…the guys break down how the Celtics adjusted their defense to mitigate him. AND – Jayson Tatum’s outfit got a ton of attention last night…find out why the guys aren’t mad at him for his fashion choice. ALSO – LeBron James is the first active player to become a billionaire, according to Forbes, Jalen & Jacoby discuss how he has changed the game for athletes on and off the court.  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
itunes:subtitle: J&J: What Did The Celtics Do Right Down The Stretch In The 4th Quarter?
